translations: 重大的；严肃的；黯淡的（grave 的变形）

sentences.sentence: Cyber-threats "pose one of the gravest national-security dangers" the country is facing.
sentences.translation: 网络威胁是这个国家正面临的“最严重的国家安全威胁之一”。

sentences.sentence: He talks of the most impossible things in the gravest possible manner.
sentences.translation: 他会带着最严肃的表情告诉我一些最离奇的事情。

sentences.sentence: With so many DAMS, it is hard to know where the gravest danger lies.
sentences.translation: 有这么多的危险水坝，很难说最最危险的是哪座。
